value.title: DeepSeek OCR 2: AI That Reads Documents Like Humans
value.content:
If you’ve worked with DeepSeek OCR, you already know it was efficient at extracting text and compressing documents. Where it often fell short was reading order and layout-heavy pages, multi-column PDFs, dense tables, and mixed content still needed cleanup. DeepSeek OCR 2 is DeepSeek’s answer to that gap. value.content:

value.title: I Tested Clawdbot and Built My Own Local AI Agent
value.content:
Most AI assistants still stop at conversation. They answer questions, forget everything afterward, and never actually do anything for you. Clawdbot changes that. Instead of living inside a chat window, Clawdbot runs on your own machine, stays online, remembers past interactions, and executes real tasks. value.title: Is Kimi K2.5 the BEST Open-source Model of 2026?
value.content:
My favourite open-source AI model just got a major upgrade..Kimi K2.5 is here! LLMs excel at answering questions and writing code, but real work spans messy documents, images, incomplete data, and long decision chains. Most AI systems still struggle in these environments. value.title: AgentScope AI: A Complete Guide to Building Scalable Multi-Agent Systems with LLMs
value.content:
Modern AI applications rely on intelligent agents that think, cooperate, and execute complex workflows, while single-agent systems struggle with scalability, coordination, and long-term context. value.title: Building Intelligent iOS Apps with Apple’s Foundation Models Framework
value.content:

value.title: Deep Learning vs. Machine Learning: Key Differences Explained for Business Leaders
